channel.title: 博客 on Zhou Jun's blog
channel.description: Recent content in 博客 on Zhou Jun's blog

item.title: hugo博客搭建记录
item.description: 初始本地基本操作 hugo new site blog cd blog git clone https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/ even >更改文件位置 hugo server –theme=even –buildDrafts hugo –theme=even –baseUrl=“https://junzhoublog.github.io/" cd public git init git remote add origin https://github.com/junzhoublog/junzhoublog.github.io.git git add -A cd ../.. git config –global user.email “1158290245@qq.com” git config –global user.name “junzhoublog” cd blog\public git commit -m “first commit” git push -u
